author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Pregnant woman

dies at CMCH

Commotion prevailed at the CMCH for sometime on Friday as relatives of a 27-year-old pregnant woman alleged wrong treatment as the cause of her death.

The deceased has been identified as Lakshmi, a mother of three.

Black day observed

Condemning the attack on lawyers by the police at Madras High Court on February 19, 2009, lawyers in the Coimbatore Courts boycotted all court proceedings on Friday and observed the day as ‘Black Day’.

Lawyers also staged a demonstration in front of the court premises.

Ganja seized

The police have arrested N. Balaji (41) of Vadavalli on Thursday for alleged having 1.25 kg ganja in his possession.

His arrest was made in less than a week after he got an anticipatory bail in connection with the abduction of a 23-year-old girl from New Delhi at the Coimbatore International Airport.

He has also been arrested earlier for illegal possession of a gun and bullets. The police said that he is a friend of history sheeter Mohan Ram, of Dindigul – who is prime accused in the triple murder at Sulur and is at large for more than five months.
title: Crime Notes (Four Items)
